issue.title: [CF 1624] Track healer/s in party/raid mana
issue.body:
Hi, thank you for a great addon.

 

Is it possible to setup an icon that will show when ever healer/s in a party/raid is below, lets say, 50% mana?


> Posted by CurseForge user bullfrog124 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1624 | Raw

comments.body:
Unit Condition Icon > Who to Watch > Party 1-4  > Unit Conditions > Unit Group Role > Unit > Healer > Mana Percent > Unit > Percent > Notifications

 

This appear to work but I am uncertain if it is working as intended and I feel like it might glitch out at times.

> Posted by CurseForge user bullfrog124

Every - every frame. With one frame you can check only 1 of them at same time (I mean any one unit which has been return true). Better create your frames with 2 types, for raid with raid1-40 untis and for party with party1-4 units because party check only your local current group.

Edited Dec 6, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user cordankos

Sure, thanks. If I understand you correctly I suppose I could then use a meta icon.

 

If this is indeed how you would go about it then that is great. I have yet to test it probably tho.

 

Do you happen to understand the use case for group 1-40?
